system.notes: The First true armour of the Space Marines, from the earliest years of the Solar Reclaimation. Additional -10 to Concealment and Silent Move, +10 to prevent Cohesion Damage, +20 Fellowship with Space Marines. +25 Strength. Subsystems: Autosenses (+5), Osmotic Sustainer, Pain Suppressant (6), Vox Link, Magnetised Boots, Nutrient Recycling (1 Week), Recoil Suppression. -20 Manual Dexterity Mod. Note: Magnetised Boots can't be turned off. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet. Increases Size to Hulking.
